<div id="readme" class="md" data-path="README.md"><article class="markdown-body entry-content container-lg" itemprop="text"><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸ± Mojo Chatbot</h1><a id="user-content--mojo-chatbot" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸ± Mojo Chatbot" href="#-mojo-chatbot"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="./public/img/mockup.png"><img src="./public/img/mockup.png" alt="Mojo Chatbot Screenshot" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>
<p dir="auto">A modern, interactive AI chatbot built with React and powered by Groq API. Mojo is a friendly turquoise cat assistant that provides helpful responses with personality and style.</p>
<p dir="auto"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c31126fcb6f4cb77220a3916a05cfaf4a86500593794dbdc2c7a6746c7f70249/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f52656163742d31382e332e312d3631444146423f6c6f676f3d7265616374"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c31126fcb6f4cb77220a3916a05cfaf4a86500593794dbdc2c7a6746c7f70249/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f52656163742d31382e332e312d3631444146423f6c6f676f3d7265616374" alt="React" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/badge/React-18.3.1-61DAFB?logo=react" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d624bbb16055b6e962f0bc6e9a44bbf96343f3a6999eba9ab0fea22a3c77eee4/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f566974652d362e302e332d3634364346463f6c6f676f3d76697465"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d624bbb16055b6e962f0bc6e9a44bbf96343f3a6999eba9ab0fea22a3c77eee4/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f566974652d362e302e332d3634364346463f6c6f676f3d76697465" alt="Vite" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Vite-6.0.3-646CFF?logo=vite" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5caa455d8debc46fb23abbadb45a733a937f3910a73fc875c2f7820468e1bb54/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f4c6963656e73652d4d49542d677265656e"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/5caa455d8debc46fb23abbadb45a733a937f3910a73fc875c2f7820468e1bb54/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f4c6963656e73652d4d49542d677265656e" alt="License" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-green" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">âœ¨ Features</h2><a id="user-content--features" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: âœ¨ Features" href="#-features"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong>ğŸ¤– AI-Powered Responses</strong> - Integration with Groq API (Llama 3.3 70B model)</li>
<li><strong>âŒ¨ï¸ Typewriter Effect</strong> - Smooth character-by-character message animation</li>
<li><strong>ğŸ˜º Mood Detection</strong> - Dynamic avatar changes based on conversation context (10 different moods)</li>
<li><strong>ğŸ¨ Glassmorphism Design</strong> - Modern UI with frosted glass effects and gradient animations</li>
<li><strong>ğŸ“± Fully Responsive</strong> - Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices</li>
<li><strong>â™¿ Accessibility</strong> - ARIA labels and keyboard navigation support</li>
<li><strong>ğŸ’¾ Session Persistence</strong> - Conversation history maintained during session</li>
<li><strong>ğŸ¯ Smart Focus Management</strong> - Auto-focus on input field for better UX</li>
<li><strong>âš¡ Skip Animation</strong> - Click messages to instantly display full text</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack</h2><a id="user-content-ï¸-tech-stack" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack" href="#ï¸-tech-stack"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><strong>React</strong> 18.3.1 - UI library</li>
<li><strong>Vite</strong> 6.0.3 - Build tool and dev server</li>
<li><strong>Groq API</strong> - LLM provider (Llama 3.3 70B Versatile)</li>
<li><strong>React Icons</strong> - Icon library (Lucide React)</li>
<li><strong>CSS3</strong> - Styling with custom properties and animations</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸ“¦ Installation</h2><a id="user-content--installation" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸ“¦ Installation" href="#-installation"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 class="heading-element" dir="auto">Prerequisites</h3><a id="user-content-prerequisites" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Prerequisites" href="#prerequisites"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Node.js 18+ and npm/yarn</li>
<li>Groq API key (get one at <a href="https://console.groq.com" rel="nofollow">console.groq.com</a>)</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 class="heading-element" dir="auto">Setup</h3><a id="user-content-setup" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Setup" href="#setup"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ol dir="auto">
<li>
<p dir="auto">Clone the repository</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="git clone &lt;your-repo-url&gt;
cd mojo-chatbot"><pre>git clone <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>your-repo-url<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>
<span class="pl-c1">cd</span> mojo-chatbot</pre></div>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto">Install dependencies</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="npm install"><pre>npm install</pre></div>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto">Configure API proxy</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p dir="auto">The project uses a proxy server to handle Groq API calls. Update the <code>API_URL</code> in <code>src/services/groqService.js</code>:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="const API_URL = 'https://your-proxy-url.vercel.app/api/chat';"><pre><span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-c1">API_URL</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-s">'https://your-proxy-url.vercel.app/api/chat'</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span></pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸš€ Development</h2><a id="user-content--development" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸš€ Development" href="#-development"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">Start the development server:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="npm run dev"><pre>npm run dev</pre></div>
<p dir="auto">The app will be available at <code>http://localhost:5173</code></p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸ—ï¸ Build</h2><a id="user-content-ï¸-build" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸ—ï¸ Build" href="#ï¸-build"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">Create a production build:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="npm run build"><pre>npm run build</pre></div>
<p dir="auto">Preview the production build:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="npm run preview"><pre>npm run preview</pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸ“ Project Structure</h2><a id="user-content--project-structure" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸ“ Project Structure" href="#-project-structure"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="snippet-clipboard-content notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="â”œâ”€â”€ public/

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">âš™ï¸ Configuration</h2><a id="user-content-ï¸-configuration" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: âš™ï¸ Configuration" href="#ï¸-configuration"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 class="heading-element" dir="auto">Groq API Parameters</h3><a id="user-content-groq-api-parameters" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Groq API Parameters" href="#groq-api-parameters"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">Modify parameters in <code>src/services/groqService.js</code>:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="{
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  temperature: 0.9,          // Creativity level (0-2)
  top_p: 0.95,              // Nucleus sampling
  max_tokens: 400,          // Response length limit
  presence_penalty: 0.3,    // Topic diversity
  frequency_penalty: 0.4    // Repetition penalty
}"><pre><span class="pl-kos">{</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">model</span>: <span class="pl-s">'llama-3.3-70b-versatile'</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">temperature</span>: <span class="pl-c1">0.9</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>          <span class="pl-c">// Creativity level (0-2)</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">top_p</span>: <span class="pl-c1">0.95</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>              <span class="pl-c">// Nucleus sampling</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">max_tokens</span>: <span class="pl-c1">400</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>          <span class="pl-c">// Response length limit</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">presence_penalty</span>: <span class="pl-c1">0.3</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>    <span class="pl-c">// Topic diversity</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">frequency_penalty</span>: <span class="pl-c1">0.4</span>    <span class="pl-c">// Repetition penalty</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span></pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 class="heading-element" dir="auto">Typewriter Speed</h3><a id="user-content-typewriter-speed" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Typewriter Speed" href="#typewriter-speed"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">Adjust typing speed in <code>src/components/Chatbot.jsx</code>:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="&lt;TypewriterMessage
  cps={18}              // Characters per second
  startDelay={250}      // Initial delay (ms)
  showCaret={true}      // Show blinking cursor
  enableSkip={true}     // Allow click to skip
/&gt;"><pre><span class="pl-c1">&lt;</span><span class="pl-v">TypewriterMessage</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">cps</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-c1">18</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span>              <span class="pl-c">// Characters per second</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">startDelay</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-c1">250</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span>      <span class="pl-c">// Initial delay (ms)</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">showCaret</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-c1">true</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span>      <span class="pl-c">// Show blinking cursor</span>
  <span class="pl-c1">enableSkip</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span><span class="pl-c1">true</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span>     <span class="pl-c">// Allow click to skip</span>
<span class="pl-kos">/&gt;</span></pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 class="heading-element" dir="auto">Mood Detection</h3><a id="user-content-mood-detection" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Mood Detection" href="#mood-detection"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 class="heading-element" dir="auto">System Prompt</h3><a id="user-content-system-prompt" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: System Prompt" href="#system-prompt"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

  role: 'system',
  content: 'You are MOJO, a turquoise cat. You are an AI assistant...'

  <span class="pl-c1">role</span>: <span class="pl-s">'system'</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸŒ Deployment</h2><a id="user-content--deployment" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸŒ Deployment" href="#-deployment"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 class="heading-element" dir="auto">Vercel</h3><a id="user-content-vercel" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Vercel" href="#vercel"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ol dir="auto">
<li>Push your code to GitHub</li>
<li>Import project in Vercel</li>
<li>Configure environment variables</li>
<li>Deploy</li>
</ol>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸ“ API Proxy Setup</h2><a id="user-content--api-proxy-setup" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸ“ API Proxy Setup" href="#-api-proxy-setup"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">For security, API calls go through a proxy server. Here's a basic example:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-js notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="// api/chat.js (Vercel Serverless Function)
export default async function handler(req, res) {
  const response = await fetch('https://api.groq.com/openai/v1/chat/completions', {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: {
      'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.GROQ_API_KEY}`,
      'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    },
    body: JSON.stringify(req.body)
  });
  
  const data = await response.json();
  res.status(200).json(data);
}"><pre><span class="pl-c">// api/chat.js (Vercel Serverless Function)</span>
<span class="pl-k">export</span> <span class="pl-k">default</span> <span class="pl-k">async</span> <span class="pl-k">function</span> <span class="pl-en">handler</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">req</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-s1">res</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span>
  <span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">response</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-en">fetch</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">'https://api.groq.com/openai/v1/chat/completions'</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span>
    <span class="pl-c1">method</span>: <span class="pl-s">'POST'</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>
    <span class="pl-c1">headers</span>: <span class="pl-kos">{</span>
      <span class="pl-s">'Authorization'</span>: <span class="pl-s">`Bearer <span class="pl-s1"><span class="pl-kos">${</span><span class="pl-s1">process</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">env</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">GROQ_API_KEY</span><span class="pl-kos">}</span></span>`</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>
      <span class="pl-s">'Content-Type'</span>: <span class="pl-s">'application/json'</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>
    <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span>
    <span class="pl-c1">body</span>: <span class="pl-c1">JSON</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">stringify</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">req</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">body</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
  <span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
  
  <span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-s1">data</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-s1">response</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">json</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
  <span class="pl-s1">res</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">status</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-c1">200</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">json</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s1">data</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span></pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 class="heading-element" dir="auto">ğŸ¤ Contributing</h2><a id="user-content--contributing" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ğŸ¤ Contributing" href="#-contributing"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
